snippet: Progress in the fight against chlamydia, gonorrhea and syphilis has “unraveled,” the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said....
abstract: Q&A examines implications of recent Centers for Disease warning about surge in sexually transmitted diseases reported in United States.
lead_paragraph: Progress in the fight against chlamydia, gonorrhea and syphilis has “unraveled,” the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.

headline.main: Reported Cases of Sexually Transmitted Diseases Are on Rise
headline.print_headline: Sexually Transmitted Diseases on Rise in U.S., Report Shows
